Our Story

ArcticFlow HVAC was founded with a simple mission: to provide Las Vegas residents and businesses with honest, reliable, and expert HVAC services. With years of experience serving the Las Vegas Valley, our team of certified technicians has built a reputation for quality workmanship, fair pricing, and outstanding customer service.

We understand that in the Nevada desert, your HVAC system is not just about comfort ‚Äî it is about safety. When temperatures exceed 110¬∞F in summer or drop below freezing on winter nights, you need a heating and cooling company that responds quickly and gets the job done right the first time.

As a locally owned and operated business, we take pride in being part of the Las Vegas community. Every customer is our neighbor, and we treat every home and business with the care and respect they deserve. Our technicians are not just skilled professionals ‚Äî they are members of this community who understand the unique challenges of maintaining comfort in the desert.

Our Values

Integrity First

We provide honest assessments and upfront pricing. If a repair is all you need, we will never push you toward an unnecessary replacement. Your trust matters more to us than any single transaction.

Quality Workmanship

Every installation, repair, and maintenance visit is performed to the highest standards. We use quality parts, follow manufacturer specifications, and stand behind our work with comprehensive warranties.

Customer Satisfaction

Your comfort is our top priority. We are not satisfied until you are satisfied. Our team goes the extra mile to ensure every customer has a positive experience, from the first phone call to the completed service.

Continuous Improvement

HVAC technology evolves constantly. Our technicians participate in ongoing training and certification programs to stay current with the latest equipment, techniques, and energy-efficient solutions.

Certifications & Training

Our technicians hold industry-recognized certifications and undergo regular training to maintain their expertise. We are licensed, bonded, and insured in the state of Nevada, and our team is factory-trained on all major HVAC brands including Carrier, Lennox, Trane, Rheem, and Goodman.

We also maintain EPA 608 certifications for refrigerant handling, ensuring that all our work meets federal environmental regulations. When you choose ArcticFlow HVAC, you are choosing a team that takes professionalism and compliance seriously.
